message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take a slightly bigger share this time, but I'm still willing to negotiate!
You think you're getting a bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm being generous, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm starting to get a bit impatient, Alice. Meet me in the middle!
I'm not meeting you in the middle yet, Bob. I want more!
I'm making a bold move, Bob. Take it or leave it, but I'm not budging!
It's time to get serious, Alice. Let's split it down the middle!
Fine, Bob. You win this round. But I'm not happy about it!
